system.sustained:
Character creates small flame that is neither hot or large enough to cause damage. Illuminates a ~5m radius space and can ignire combustable materials that increases the longer the power is sustained.
If power is targeted at an individual within range they mus make a +0 Agility Test each round psyker sustains the power after the first or catch fire. Target gains +30 to the test on any round they performed an action with the Movement subtype.
